1937: 1937 1st broadcast of "Guiding Light" on NBC radio
1949: 1949 1st Emmy Awards: Shirley Dinsdale & Pantomime Quiz (KTLA) win
1966: 1966 WCMC (now WMGM) TV channel 40 in Wildwood, NJ (NBC) 1st broadcast
1998: 1998 14th Sundance Film Festival: "Slam" wins Grand Jury Prize Dramatic
2004: 2004 20th Sundance Film Festival: "Primer", directed by Shane Carruth, wins Grand Jury Prize Dramatic
